alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 20 at 4:07AM PST until December 20 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...San Francisco Bay Shoreline and North Bay Shoreline. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal levels are running around 1 foot higher than tidal predictions. High tide will peak at 5:58 AM PST Wednesday around 6.8 to 7 feet, resulting in minor coastal flooding for low-lying, flood-prone spots adjacent to the San Francisco Bay.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
